enValue: An attractive, feature-rich, standards-compliant mapping interface for accessing and displaying your geospatial data.
frValue: An attractive, feature-rich, standards-compliant mapping interface for accessing and displaying your geospatial data.

enValue: Developed in-house at Environment and Climate Change Canada, RAMP has been the web GIS visualization solution for Canadians and Federal departments for over 10 years.
frValue: Developed in-house at Environment and Climate Change Canada, RAMP has been the web GIS visualization solution for Canadians and Federal departments for over 10 years.

enValue: Use ctrl + scroll to zoom the map
frValue: Utilisez les touches Ctrl et + pour faire un zoom de la carte

enValue: Climate Action Map
frValue: Climate Action Map

enValue: Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators
frValue: Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators

enValue: GeoMet Web Service
frValue: GeoMet Web Service

enValue: Display Multiple Types of Data
frValue: Display Multiple Types of Data

enValue: RAMP supports popular geospatial datatypes, via web services or static files you can upload. RAMP can ingest Esri™ Feature/Map services, OGC WMS, WFS, GeoJSON, CSV, and many more.
frValue: RAMP supports popular geospatial datatypes, via web services or static files you can upload. RAMP can ingest Esri™ Feature/Map services, OGC WMS, WFS, GeoJSON, CSV, and many more.

enValue: RAMP displaying multiple different data types.
frValue: RAMP displaying multiple different data types.

enValue: In this example, we share point-based data layer of releases of lead to water, by facility, from the {cesi} application, overlaid with reference layers for Ecozone boundaries and Conserved Areas of Canada. A WMS layer from the {geomet} shows precipitation over the past 24 hours.
frValue: In this example, we share point-based data layer of releases of lead to water, by facility, from the {cesi} application, overlaid with reference layers for Ecozone boundaries and Conserved Areas of Canada. A WMS layer from the {geomet} shows precipitation over the past 24 hours.

enValue: Data Mashups & Analysis
frValue: Data Mashups & Analysis

enValue: Datasets can be overlaid and combined in a RAMP-based application. Leverage RAMP to compare datasets from different sources and display them concurrently in a common mapping interface.
frValue: Datasets can be overlaid and combined in a RAMP-based application. Leverage RAMP to compare datasets from different sources and display them concurrently in a common mapping interface.

enValue: RAMP displaying two data sets at once.
frValue: RAMP displaying two data sets at once.

enValue: In this example, we mashup datasets from different sources: Locations of First Nations people from INAC, and deposits of Mercury into water by facilities across Canada from the {cesi} application.
frValue: In this example, we mashup datasets from different sources: Locations of First Nations people from INAC, and deposits of Mercury into water by facilities across Canada from the {cesi} application.

enValue: Clip n' Ship Data Extractions
frValue: Clip n' Ship Data Extractions

enValue: Filter your geospatial data and extract customized views through the RAMP data-grid functionality.
frValue: Filter your geospatial data and extract customized views through the RAMP data-grid functionality.

enValue: This example shows a pre-filtered data layer on the map: Solar energy projects from the {cam} dataset. The filter can be cleared to reveal the rest of the data, or exported and saved for a future report.
frValue: This example shows a pre-filtered data layer on the map: Solar energy projects from the {cam} dataset. The filter can be cleared to reveal the rest of the data, or exported and saved for a future report.

enValue: Provide Context for Your Data
frValue: Provide Context for Your Data

enValue: A suite of basemaps from Esri™ and Natural Resources Canada help contextualize your geospatial data, or add your own! Custom extents and shortcuts make your data easy to find and visualize.
frValue: A suite of basemaps from Esri™ and Natural Resources Canada help contextualize your geospatial data, or add your own! Custom extents and shortcuts make your data easy to find and visualize.

enValue: RAMP with a custom extent centered on a data set.
frValue: RAMP with a custom extent centered on a data set.

enValue: This example sets a default extent focused on the province of Alberta. The dataset displays Oil Sands facilities across the region.
frValue: This example sets a default extent focused on the province of Alberta. The dataset displays Oil Sands facilities across the region.

enValue: WCAG Accessible - Without the "Clunk"
frValue: WCAG Accessible - Without the "Clunk"

enValue: Our development team prides itself on its above-and-beyond approach to accessibility and ensuring your maps and data are welcoming and attractive to all users.
frValue: Our development team prides itself on its above-and-beyond approach to accessibility and ensuring your maps and data are welcoming and attractive to all users.

enValue: RAMP with the accessible legend and data grid open while still showing the map data.
frValue: RAMP with the accessible legend and data grid open while still showing the map data.

enValue: Our enhanced data grid functionality permits multiple ways of accessing, sorting, and filtering data. RAMP is designed with accessibility at the forefront, and strives for 100% WCAG 2.1 "AA" compliance with every release and update. The RAMP development team puts usability and accessibility at the utmost importance for interactive web mapping applications, while maintaining a clean and attractive interface. The dataset displayed is from the {cam}, demonstration projects across Canada intended to prevent, mitigate, and adapt to the effects of climate change.
frValue: Our enhanced data grid functionality permits multiple ways of accessing, sorting, and filtering data. RAMP is designed with accessibility at the forefront, and strives for 100% WCAG 2.1 "AA" compliance with every release and update. The RAMP development team puts usability and accessibility at the utmost importance for interactive web mapping applications, while maintaining a clean and attractive interface. The dataset displayed is from the {cam}, demonstration projects across Canada intended to prevent, mitigate, and adapt to the effects of climate change.

enValue: Mobile-friendly / Device agnostic
frValue: Mobile-friendly / Device agnostic

enValue: Whether on phone, tablet, desktop computer, or projected on a wall – RAMP is an attractive and responsive solution your project needs.
frValue: Whether on phone, tablet, desktop computer, or projected on a wall – RAMP is an attractive and responsive solution your project needs.

enValue: RAMP as it looks on a mobile device.
frValue: RAMP as it looks on a mobile device.

enValue: In this example (best appreciated on a widescreen display), RAMP is presented in 3 sizes: full width, embedded within text or page contents, and mobile view. All 3 maps are displaying the same Water Quality dataset from the {cesi} application.
frValue: In this example (best appreciated on a widescreen display), RAMP is presented in 3 sizes: full width, embedded within text or page contents, and mobile view. All 3 maps are displaying the same Water Quality dataset from the {cesi} application.

enValue: Easy-to-Implement
frValue: Easy-to-Implement

enValue: Embed a tiny RAMP-based map into your report, host a full-screen geospatial data application, or integrate into your departmental-themed webpage. Tell a Story with multiple instances of RAMP on a single page.
frValue: Embed a tiny RAMP-based map into your report, host a full-screen geospatial data application, or integrate into your departmental-themed webpage. Tell a Story with multiple instances of RAMP on a single page.

enValue: This example shows how RAMP can easily be inserted into a Canada.ca web template. A data layer of weather stations across Canada from the Meteorological Service of Canada's 150th anniversary is displayed.
frValue: This example shows how RAMP can easily be inserted into a Canada.ca web template. A data layer of weather stations across Canada from the Meteorological Service of Canada's 150th anniversary is displayed.

enValue: Plugins
frValue: Plugins

enValue: Is RAMP missing a feature or requirement to satisfy your application or workflows? Many 3rd-party plugins already exist for you to work with.
frValue: Is RAMP missing a feature or requirement to satisfy your application or workflows? Many 3rd-party plugins already exist for you to work with.

enValue: In this example, Cadmium and Mercury Emissions data from the {cesi} application are overlaid on the map. The plugins enabled are the swiper module and drawing tools.
frValue: In this example, Cadmium and Mercury Emissions data from the {cesi} application are overlaid on the map. The plugins enabled are the swiper module and drawing tools.

enValue: Engineered for Everyone, Ideal for You
frValue: Engineered for Everyone, Ideal for You

enValue: RAMP can be configured, customized, and tailored, to meet a wide variety of business requirements and user needs.
frValue: RAMP can be configured, customized, and tailored, to meet a wide variety of business requirements and user needs.

enValue: Accessible
frValue: Accessible

enValue: Fully compliant with WCAG “AA” criteria for accessibility, and several other Treasury Board Secretariat standards and directives.
frValue: Fully compliant with WCAG “AA” criteria for accessibility, and several other Treasury Board Secretariat standards and directives.

enValue: Responsive
frValue: Responsive

enValue: RAMP-based applications work on any modern supported device and web browser.
frValue: RAMP-based applications work on any modern supported device and web browser.

enValue: Plugins
frValue: Plugins

enValue: RAMP’s modular design allows for innovation and flexibility – satisfy client requirements with specialized plugins to meet specific user needs.
frValue: RAMP’s modular design allows for innovation and flexibility – satisfy client requirements with specialized plugins to meet specific user needs.

enValue: Easy to Integrate
frValue: Easy to Integrate

enValue: RAMP can be integrated into your existing webpage’s theme, the Canada.ca template, or integrated into an application. Include multiple RAMP maps in a single page.
frValue: RAMP can be integrated into your existing webpage’s theme, the Canada.ca template, or integrated into an application. Include multiple RAMP maps in a single page.

enValue: Customizable
frValue: Customizable

enValue: A wide selection of configuration options for functionality, visual appearance, and data presentation are available with ample documentation to support your data.
frValue: A wide selection of configuration options for functionality, visual appearance, and data presentation are available with ample documentation to support your data.

enValue: Open Source
frValue: Open Source

enValue: RAMP is built on principals of collaboration, industry best practices, Government of Canada standards, and transparency. RAMP is open-source software available to anyone to use and modify.
frValue: RAMP is built on principals of collaboration, industry best practices, Government of Canada standards, and transparency. RAMP is open-source software available to anyone to use and modify.

enValue: Coming Soon in RAMP4
frValue: Coming Soon in RAMP4

enValue: Features and enhancements for a new generation of web mapping applications.
frValue: Features and enhancements for a new generation of web mapping applications.

enValue: Enhanced Interface
frValue: Enhances Interface

enValue: RAMP4’s redesigned user interface is feature-rich, intuitive, and responsive for all devices and resolutions.
frValue: RAMP4’s redesigned user interface is feature-rich, intuitive, and responsive for all devices and resolutions.

enValue: Developer-Friendly
frValue: Developer-Friendly

enValue: RAMP4 comes with a simplified core and a robust API, with ample documentation. RAMP4 is built with 3rd party developers in mind.
frValue: RAMP4 comes with a simplified core and a robust API, with ample documentation. RAMP4 is built with 3rd party developers in mind.

enValue: Faster than Ever
frValue: Faster than Ever

enValue: Optimization and a ground-up refactoring of RAMP makes this one of the fastest, cleanest, standards-compliant, and efficient web mapping solution around.
frValue: Optimization and a ground-up refactoring of RAMP makes this one of the fastest, cleanest, standards-compliant, and efficient web mapping solution around.

enValue: Canadian Center for Climate Services Climate Data Viewer (CCCS)
frValue: Canadian Center for Climate Services Climate Data Viewer (CCCS)

enValue: Climate simulations, forecasts, changes, and estimates can all be overlaid and analyzed from our Climate Data Viewer application, as part of the suite of tools available in the Canadian Centre for Climate Services.
frValue: Climate simulations, forecasts, changes, and estimates can all be overlaid and analyzed from our Climate Data Viewer application, as part of the suite of tools available in the Canadian Centre for Climate Services.

enValue: RAMP from the Canadian Center for Climate Services Climate Data Viewer site. RAMP is shown with custom controls and a custom display of point details.
frValue: RAMP from the Canadian Center for Climate Services Climate Data Viewer site. RAMP is shown with custom controls and a custom display of point details.

enValue: https://climate-viewer.canada.ca/climate-maps.html
frValue: https://climate-viewer.canada.ca/climate-maps.html

enValue: Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators (CESI)
frValue: Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators (CESI)

enValue: The Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators (CESI) program provides data and information to track Canada's performance on key environmental sustainability issues including climate change and air quality, water quality and availability, and protecting nature. The environmental indicators are based on objective and comprehensive information and convey environmental trends in a straightforward and transparent manner. The RAMP-based interactive maps provide numerous contexts and methods of data access for environmental indicators to make data discovery and analysis straightforward for all Canadians.
frValue: The Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators (CESI) program provides data and information to track Canada's performance on key environmental sustainability issues including climate change and air quality, water quality and availability, and protecting nature. The environmental indicators are based on objective and comprehensive information and convey environmental trends in a straightforward and transparent manner. The RAMP-based interactive maps provide numerous contexts and methods of data access for environmental indicators to make data discovery and analysis straightforward for all Canadians.

enValue: RAMP from the Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators site. RAMP is displaying multiple layers with the legends expanded for context.
frValue: RAMP from the Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators site. RAMP is displaying multiple layers with the legends expanded for context.

enValue: https://indicators-map.canada.ca/
frValue: https://indicators-map.canada.ca/

enValue: Climate Action Map (CAM)
frValue: Climate Action Map (CAM)

enValue: See how the Government of Canada is fighting climate change in communities across the country. On this interactive map, you can find information on investments on: Clean and renewable energy, energy efficiency in homes and businesses, Made-in-Canada clean technologies, electric vehicle charging stations and alternative fuel infrastructure, public transit, investments in Indigenous, rural and remote communities to transition to cleaner energy sources, and support for communities to adapt to a changing climate.
frValue: See how the Government of Canada is fighting climate change in communities across the country. On this interactive map, you can find information on investments on: Clean and renewable energy, energy efficiency in homes and businesses, Made-in-Canada clean technologies, electric vehicle charging stations and alternative fuel infrastructure, public transit, investments in Indigenous, rural and remote communities to transition to cleaner energy sources, and support for communities to adapt to a changing climate.

enValue: RAMP from the Climate Action Map site. Custom data icons are displayed on the map.
frValue: RAMP from the Climate Action Map site. Custom data icons are displayed on the map.

enValue: https://climate-change.canada.ca/climate-action-map/
frValue: https://climate-change.canada.ca/climate-action-map/

enValue: Open Maps
frValue: Open Maps

enValue: Open Maps provides access to the Government of Canada's geospatial information. You can combine, visualize, and analyze geospatial data and collaborate with other Canadians. Open Maps is deliverable of the Federal Geospatial Platform, to which RAMP is a key component.
frValue: Open Maps provides access to the Government of Canada's geospatial information. You can combine, visualize, and analyze geospatial data and collaborate with other Canadians. Open Maps is deliverable of the Federal Geospatial Platform, to which RAMP is a key component.

enValue: Examples of maps on the Open Maps site are shown. These have a thumbnail, link and short description.
frValue: Examples of maps on the Open Maps site are shown. These have a thumbnail, link and short description.

enValue: https://open.canada.ca/en/maps
frValue: https://open.canada.ca/en/maps
